verses.verse: בָּעֵ֤ת <WH6256> At the same time הַהִיא֙ <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> will I be the God לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> of all מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <WH4940> of all the families יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like יִֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> become לִ֥י לְעָֽם׃ <WH5971> and they shall be my people ס

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD מָצָ֥א <WH4672> found חֵן֙ <WH2580> grace בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> in the wilderness עַ֖ם <WH5971> The people שְׂרִ֣ידֵי <WH8300> [which were] left חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword הָל֥וֹךְ <WH1980> when I went לְהַרְגִּיע֖וֹ <WH7280> to cause him to rest יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> [even] Israel

מֵרָח֕וֹק <WH7350> of old יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD נִרְאָ֣ה <WH7200> hath appeared לִ֑י וְאַהֲבַ֤ת <WH160> love עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> thee with an everlasting אֲהַבְתִּ֔יךְ <WH157> unto me [saying] Yea I have loved עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that מְשַׁכְתִּ֥יךְ <WH4900> have I drawn חָֽסֶד׃ <WH2617> therefore with lovingkindness

ע֤וֹד <WH5750> Again אֶבְנֵךְ֙ <WH1129> Again I will build וְֽנִבְנֵ֔ית <WH1129> thee and thou shalt be built בְּתוּלַ֖ת <WH1330> O virgin יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel ע֚וֹד <WH5750> Again תַּעְדִּ֣י <WH5710> thou shalt again be adorned תֻפַּ֔יִךְ <WH8596> with thy tabrets וְיָצָ֖את <WH3318> and shalt go forth בִּמְח֥וֹל <WH4234> in the dances מְשַׂחֲקִֽים׃ <WH7832> of them that make merry

ע֚וֹד <WH5750> Again תִּטְּעִ֣י <WH5193> Thou shalt yet plant כְרָמִ֔ים <WH3754> vines בְּהָרֵ֖י <WH2022> upon the mountains שֹֽׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria נָטְע֥וּ <WH5193> the planters נֹטְעִ֖ים <WH5193> shall plant וְחִלֵּֽלוּ׃ <WH2490> and shall eat [them] as common things

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> For there shall be י֔וֹם <WH3117> a day קָרְא֥וּ <WH7121> shall cry נֹצְרִ֖ים <WH5341> [that] the watchmen בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> upon the mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> Ephraim ק֚וּמוּ <WH6965> Arise וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> ye and let us go up צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> to Zion אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God פ

כִּי־ <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD רָנּ֤וּ <WH7442> Sing לְיַֽעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> for Jacob שִׂמְחָ֔ה <WH8057> with gladness וְצַהֲל֖וּ <WH6670> and shout בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> among the chief הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the nations הַשְׁמִ֤יעוּ <WH8085> publish הַֽלְלוּ֙ <WH1984> ye praise וְאִמְר֔וּ <WH559> ye and say הוֹשַׁ֤ע <WH3467> save יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD אֶֽת־ <WH853> עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> thy people אֵ֖ת <WH853> שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֨יא <WH935> Behold I will bring אוֹתָ֜ם <WH853> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> country צָפ֗וֹן <WH6828> them from the north וְקִבַּצְתִּים֮ <WH6908> and gather מִיַּרְכְּתֵי־ <WH3411> them from the coasts אָרֶץ֒ <WH776> of the earth בָּ֚ם עִוֵּ֣ר <WH5787> [and] with them the blind וּפִסֵּ֔חַ <WH6455> and the lame הָרָ֥ה <WH2030> the woman with child וְיֹלֶ֖דֶת <WH3205> and her that travaileth with child יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together קָהָ֥ל <WH6951> company גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> a great יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> shall return הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2008> here

בִּבְכִ֣י <WH1065> with weeping יָבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> They shall come וּֽבְתַחֲנוּנִים֮ <WH8469> and with supplications אֽוֹבִילֵם֒ <WH2986> will I lead אֽוֹלִיכֵם֙ <WH1980> walk אֶל־ <WH413> by נַ֣חֲלֵי <WH5158> by the rivers מַ֔יִם <WH4325> of waters בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> way יָשָׁ֔ר <WH3477> in a straight לֹ֥א <WH3808> they will not יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <WH3782> wherein they shall not stumble בָּ֑הּ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הָיִ֤יתִי <WH1961> I am לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> to Israel לְאָ֔ב <WH1> for I am a father וְאֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> and Ephraim בְּכֹ֥רִי <WH1060> [is] my firstborn הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he ס

שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> Hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> O ye nations וְהַגִּ֥ידוּ <WH5046> and declare בָאִיִּ֖ים <WH339> [it] in the isles מִמֶּרְחָ֑ק <WH4801> afar off וְאִמְר֗וּ <WH559> and say מְזָרֵ֤ה <WH2219> He that scattered יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel יְקַבְּצֶ֔נּוּ <WH6908> will gather וּשְׁמָר֖וֹ <WH8104> him and keep כְּרֹעֶ֥ה <WH7462> him as a shepherd עֶדְרֽוֹ׃ <WH5739> [doth] his flock

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פָדָ֥ה <WH6299> hath redeemed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> Jacob וּגְאָל֕וֹ <WH1350> and ransomed מִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> him from the hand חָזָ֥ק <WH2389> of [him that was] stronger מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> than

וּבָאוּ֮ <WH935> Therefore they shall come וְרִנְּנ֣וּ <WH7442> and sing בִמְרוֹם־ <WH4791> in the height צִיּוֹן֒ <WH6726> of Zion וְנָהֲר֞וּ <WH5102> and shall flow together אֶל־ <WH413> over ט֣וּב <WH2898> to the goodness יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> and over דָּגָן֙ <WH1715> for wheat וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over תִּירֹ֣שׁ <WH8492> and for wine וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over יִצְהָ֔ר <WH3323> and for oil וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> and for the young צֹ֖אן <WH6629> of the flock וּבָקָ֑ר <WH1241> and of the herd וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become נַפְשָׁם֙ <WH5315> and their soul כְּגַ֣ן <WH1588> garden רָוֶ֔ה <WH7302> shall be as a watered וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יוֹסִ֥יפוּ <WH3254> any more לְדַאֲבָ֖ה <WH1669> and they shall not sorrow עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then תִּשְׂמַ֤ח <WH8055> rejoice בְּתוּלָה֙ <WH1330> Then shall the virgin בְּמָח֔וֹל <WH4234> in the dance וּבַחֻרִ֥ים <WH970> both young men וּזְקֵנִ֖ים <WH2205> and old יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together וְהָפַכְתִּ֨י <WH2015> for I will turn אֶבְלָ֤ם <WH60> their mourning לְשָׂשׂוֹן֙ <WH8342> into joy וְנִ֣חַמְתִּ֔ים <WH5162> and will comfort וְשִׂמַּחְתִּ֖ים <WH8055> them and make them rejoice מִיגוֹנָֽם׃ <WH3015> from their sorrow

וְרִוֵּיתִ֛י <WH7301> And I will satiate נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> the soul הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> of the priests דָּ֑שֶׁן <WH1880> with fatness וְעַמִּ֛י <WH5971> and my people אֶת־ <WH854> with טוּבִ֥י <WH2898> with my goodness יִשְׂבָּ֖עוּ <WH7646> shall be satisfied נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD ק֣וֹל <WH6963> A voice בְּרָמָ֤ה <WH7414> in Ramah נִשְׁמָע֙ <WH8085> was heard נְהִי֙ <WH5092> lamentation בְּכִ֣י <WH1065> weeping תַמְרוּרִ֔ים <WH8563> [and] bitter רָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> Rahel מְבַכָּ֣ה <WH1058> weeping עַל־ <WH5921> for בָּנֶ֑יהָ <WH1121> for her children מֵאֲנָ֛ה <WH3985> refused לְהִנָּחֵ֥ם <WH5162> to be comforted עַל־ <WH5921> for בָּנֶ֖יהָ <WH1121> for her children כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because אֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH369> are no ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD מִנְעִ֤י <WH4513> Refrain קוֹלֵךְ֙ <WH6963> thy voice מִבֶּ֔כִי <WH1065> from weeping וְעֵינַ֖יִךְ <WH5869> and thine eyes מִדִּמְעָ֑ה <WH1832> from tears כִּי֩ <WH3588> for יֵ֨שׁ <WH3426> shall be שָׂכָ֤ר <WH7939> rewarded לִפְעֻלָּתֵךְ֙ <WH6468> for thy work נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְשָׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> and they shall come again מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> from the land אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> of the enemy

וְיֵשׁ־ <WH3426> And there is תִּקְוָ֥ה <WH8615> hope לְאַחֲרִיתֵ֖ךְ <WH319> in thine end נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְשָׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> shall come again בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> that thy children לִגְבוּלָֽם׃ <WH1366> to their own border ס

שָׁמ֣וֹעַ <WH8085> I have surely שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <WH8085> heard אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> Ephraim מִתְנוֹדֵ֔ד <WH5110> bemoaning יִסַּרְתַּ֙נִי֙ <WH3256> himself [thus] Thou hast chastised וָֽאִוָּסֵ֔ר <WH3256> me and I was chastised כְּעֵ֖גֶל <WH5695> as a bullock לֹ֣א <WH3808> not לֻמָּ֑ד <WH3925> to teach הֲשִׁיבֵ֣נִי <WH7725> [to the yoke] turn וְאָשׁ֔וּבָה <WH7725> thou me and I shall be turned כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> You יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for thou [art] the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> my God

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> Surely after שׁוּבִי֙ <WH7725> that I was turned נִחַ֔מְתִּי <WH5162> I repented וְאַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> and after הִוָּ֣דְעִ֔י <WH3045> that I was instructed סָפַ֖קְתִּי <WH5606> I smote עַל־ <WH5921> on יָרֵ֑ךְ <WH3409> upon [my] thigh בֹּ֚שְׁתִּי <WH954> I was ashamed וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also נִכְלַ֔מְתִּי <WH3637> yea even confounded כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because נָשָׂ֖אתִי <WH5375> because I did bear חֶרְפַּ֥ת <WH2781> the reproach נְעוּרָֽי׃ <WH5271> of my youth

הֲבֵן֩ <WH1121> afflicted יַקִּ֨יר <WH3357> my dear לִ֜י אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> [Is] Ephraim אִ֚ם <WH518> lo יֶ֣לֶד <WH3206> boy שַׁעֲשֻׁעִ֔ים <WH8191> delight כִּֽי־ <WH3588> as מִדֵּ֤י <WH1767> often דַבְּרִי֙ <WH1696> I spake בּ֔וֹ זָכֹ֥ר <WH2142> against him I do earnestly אֶזְכְּרֶ֖נּוּ <WH2142> remember ע֑וֹד <WH5750> again עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that הָמ֤וּ <WH1993> are troubled מֵעַי֙ <WH4578> him still therefore my bowels ל֔וֹ רַחֵ֥ם <WH7355> for him I will surely אֲ‍ֽרַחֲמֶ֖נּוּ <WH7355> have mercy נְאֻם־ <WH5002> upon him saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

הַצִּ֧יבִי <WH5324> Set thee up לָ֣ךְ צִיֻּנִ֗ים <WH6725> waymarks שִׂ֤מִי <WH7760> make לָךְ֙ תַּמְרוּרִ֔ים <WH8564> thee high heaps שִׁ֣תִי <WH7896> set לִבֵּ֔ךְ <WH3820> thine heart לַֽמְסִלָּ֖ה <WH4546> toward the highway דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> [even] the way [הָלָכְתִּי כ] (הָלָ֑כְתְּ <WH1980> along ק) שׁ֚וּבִי <WH7725> turn again בְּתוּלַ֣ת <WH1330> O virgin יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel שֻׁ֖בִי <WH7725> turn again אֶל־ <WH413> about עָרַ֥יִךְ <WH5892> to these thy cities אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> to these

עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַי֙ <WH4970> How תִּתְחַמָּקִ֔ין <WH2559> How long wilt thou go about הַבַּ֖ת <WH1323> first הַשּֽׁוֹבֵבָ֑ה <WH7728> O thou backsliding כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בָרָ֨א <WH1254> hath created יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Jehovah חֲדָשָׁה֙ <WH2319> a new thing בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the earth נְקֵבָ֖ה <WH5347> A woman תְּס֥וֹבֵֽב <WH5437> shall compass גָּֽבֶר׃ <WH1397> a man ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel ע֣וֹד <WH5750> again יֹאמְר֞וּ <WH559> As yet they shall use אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this speech הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this בְּאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> in the land יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וּבְעָרָ֔יו <WH5892> and in the cities בְּשׁוּבִ֖י <WH7725> thereof when I shall bring again אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁבוּתָ֑ם <WH7622> their captivity יְבָרֶכְךָ֧ <WH1288> bless יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD נְוֵה־ <WH5116> thee O habitation צֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> of justice הַ֥ר <WH2022> [and] mountain הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> of holiness

וְיָ֥שְׁבוּ <WH3427> And there shall dwell בָ֛הּ יְהוּדָ֥ה <WH3063> in Judah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עָרָ֖יו <WH5892> itself and in all the cities יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> thereof together אִכָּרִ֕ים <WH406> husbandmen וְנָסְע֖וּ <WH5265> and they [that] go forth בַּעֵֽדֶר׃ <WH5739> with flocks

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הִרְוֵ֖יתִי <WH7301> For I have satiated נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul עֲיֵפָ֑ה <WH5889> the weary וְכָל־ <WH3605> everyone נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul דָּאֲבָ֖ה <WH1669> every sorrowful מִלֵּֽאתִי׃ <WH4390> and I have replenished
עַל־ <WH5921> and זֹ֖את <WH2063> I הֱקִיצֹ֣תִי <WH6974> Upon this I awaked וָאֶרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> and beheld וּשְׁנָתִ֖י <WH8142> and my sleep עָ֥רְבָה <WH6149> was sweet לִּֽי׃ ס

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> Behold the days בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְזָרַעְתִּ֗י <WH2232> that I will sow אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> with the seed אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man וְזֶ֥רַע <WH2233> and with the seed בְּהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> of beast

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> I שָׁקַ֣דְתִּי <WH8245> And it shall come to pass [that] like as I have watched over עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> over לִנְת֧וֹשׁ <WH5428> them to pluck up וְלִנְת֛וֹץ <WH5422> and to break down וְלַהֲרֹ֖ס <WH2040> and to throw down וּלְהַאֲבִ֣יד <WH6> and to destroy וּלְהָרֵ֑עַ <WH7489> and to afflict כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so אֶשְׁקֹ֧ד <WH8245> so will I watch over עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> over לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1129> them to build וְלִנְט֖וֹעַ <WH5193> and to plant נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those לֹא־ <WH3808> they will not יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> they shall say ע֔וֹד <WH5750> again אָב֖וֹת <WH1> no more The fathers אָ֣כְלוּ <WH398> have eaten בֹ֑סֶר <WH1155> a sour grape וְשִׁנֵּ֥י <WH8127> teeth בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> and the children's תִּקְהֶֽינָה׃ <WH6949> are set on edge

כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> But every one בַּעֲוֹנ֖וֹ <WH5771> for his own iniquity יָמ֑וּת <WH4191> shall die כָּל־ <WH3605> each הָֽאָדָ֛ם <WH120> every man הָאֹכֵ֥ל <WH398> that eateth הַבֹּ֖סֶר <WH1155> the sour grape תִּקְהֶ֥ינָה <WH6949> shall be set on edge שִׁנָּֽיו׃ <WH8127> his teeth ס

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> Behold the days בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְכָרַתִּ֗י <WH3772> that I will make אֶת־ <WH854> with בֵּ֧ית <WH1004> with the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאֶת־ <WH854> and with בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and with the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> covenant חֲדָשָֽׁה׃ <WH2319> a new

לֹ֣א <WH3808> like כַבְּרִ֗ית <WH1285> Not according to the covenant אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which כָּרַ֙תִּי֙ <WH3772> that I made אֶת־ <WH854> with אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <WH1> with their fathers בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> in the day הֶחֱזִיקִ֣י <WH2388> [that] I took בְיָדָ֔ם <WH3027> them by the hand לְהוֹצִיאָ֖ם <WH3318> to bring them out מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֵ֜מָּה <WH1992> they הֵפֵ֣רוּ <WH6565> they brake אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֗י <WH1285> which my covenant וְאָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I בָּעַ֥לְתִּי <WH1166> although I was an husband בָ֖ם נְאֻם־ <WH5002> unto them saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise הַבְּרִ֡ית <WH1285> But this [shall be] the covenant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אֶכְרֹת֩ <WH3772> that I will make אֶת־ <WH854> with בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> with the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> After הַיָּמִ֤ים <WH3117> those days הָהֵם֙ <WH1992> those נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD נָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> I will put אֶת־ <WH853> תּֽוֹרָתִי֙ <WH8451> my law בְּקִרְבָּ֔ם <WH7130> in their inward parts וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on לִבָּ֖ם <WH3820> it in their hearts אֶכְתֲּבֶ֑נָּה <WH3789> and write וְהָיִ֤יתִי <WH1961> become לָהֶם֙ לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> and will be their God וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> those יִֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> become לִ֥י לְעָֽם׃ <WH5971> and they shall be my people

וְלֹ֧א <WH3808> no יְלַמְּד֣וּ <WH3925> And they shall teach ע֗וֹד <WH5750> again אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> no more every man אֶת־ <WH853> רֵעֵ֜הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour וְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> and every man אֶת־ <WH853> אָחִיו֙ <WH251> his brother לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying דְּע֖וּ <WH3045> Know אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כוּלָּם֩ <WH3605> all manner יֵדְע֨וּ <WH3045> for they shall all know אוֹתִ֜י <WH853> לְמִקְטַנָּ֤ם <WH6996> me from the least וְעַד־ <WH5704> of them גְּדוֹלָם֙ <WH1419> of them unto the greatest נְאֻם־ <WH5002> of them saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֶסְלַח֙ <WH5545> for I will forgive לַֽעֲוֹנָ֔ם <WH5771> their iniquity וּלְחַטָּאתָ֖ם <WH2403> their sin לֹ֥א <WH3808> no אֶזְכָּר־ <WH2142> and I will remember עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> more ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> which giveth שֶׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> the sun לְא֣וֹר <WH216> for a light יוֹמָ֔ם <WH3119> by day חֻקֹּ֛ת <WH2708> [and] the ordinances יָרֵ֥חַ <WH3394> of the moon וְכוֹכָבִ֖ים <WH3556> and of the stars לְא֣וֹר <WH216> for a light לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> by night רֹגַ֤ע <WH7280> which divideth הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> the sea וַיֶּהֱמ֣וּ <WH1993> thereof roar גַלָּ֔יו <WH1530> when the waves יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name

אִם־ <WH518> If יָמֻ֜שׁוּ <WH4185> depart הַחֻקִּ֥ים <WH2706> If those ordinances הָאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> this מִלְּפָנַ֖י <WH6440> from before נְאֻם־ <WH5002> me saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD גַּם֩ <WH1571> also זֶ֨רַע <WH2233> [then] the seed יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel יִשְׁבְּת֗וּ <WH7673> also shall cease מִֽהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> being גּ֛וֹי <WH1471> from being a nation לְפָנַ֖י <WH6440> before כָּל־ <WH3605> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> me for ever ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אִם־ <WH518> If יִמַּ֤דּוּ <WH4058> can be measured שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> If heaven מִלְמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> above וְיֵחָקְר֥וּ <WH2713> searched out מֽוֹסְדֵי־ <WH4146> and the foundations אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth לְמָ֑טָּה <WH4295> beneath גַּם־ <WH1571> will also אֲנִ֞י <WH589> I אֶמְאַ֨ס <WH3988> I will also cast off בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all זֶ֧רַע <WH2233> all the seed יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel עַֽל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> for all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> they עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> for all that they have done נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> Behold the days (בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> abide ק) נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְנִבְנְתָ֤ה <WH1129> shall be built הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> that the city לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> to the LORD מִמִּגְדַּ֥ל <WH4026> from the tower חֲנַנְאֵ֖ל <WH2606> of Hananeel שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> unto the gate הַפִּנָּֽה׃ <WH6438> of the corner

וְיָצָ֨א <WH3318> shall yet go forth ע֜וֹד <WH5750> farther [קְוֵה כ] (קָ֤ו <WH6961> line ק) הַמִּדָּה֙ <WH4060> And the measuring נֶגְדּ֔וֹ <WH5048> straight עַ֖ל <WH5921> unto גִּבְעַ֣ת <WH1389> over against it upon the hill גָּרֵ֑ב <WH1619> Gareb וְנָסַ֖ב <WH5437> and shall compass about גֹּעָֽתָה׃ <WH1601> to Goath

וְכָל־ <WH3605> and the whole הָעֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> And the whole valley הַפְּגָרִ֣ים ׀ <WH6297> of the dead bodies וְהַדֶּ֡שֶׁן <WH1880> and of the ashes וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> and all [הַשְּׁרֵמֹות כ] (הַשְּׁדֵמֹות֩ <WH8309> field ק) עַד־ <WH5704> far נַ֨חַל <WH5158> unto the brook קִדְר֜וֹן <WH6939> of Kidron עַד־ <WH5704> far פִּנַּ֨ת <WH6438> unto the corner שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> gate הַסּוּסִים֙ <WH5483> of the horse מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> toward the east קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> [shall be] holy לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִנָּתֵ֧שׁ <WH5428> it shall not be plucked up וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> or יֵהָרֵ֛ס <WH2040> nor thrown down ע֖וֹד <WH5750> anymore לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> any more for ever ס
